input_query:
You plan to visit 5 European cities for 20 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 5 days in Santorini. You want to spend 7 days in Lyon. You want to spend 4 days in Warsaw. During day 17 and day 20, you have to attend a conference in Warsaw. You plan to stay in Brussels for 5 days. You would like to meet your friends at Brussels between day 13 and day 17 to tour together. You would like to visit Barcelona for 3 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Santorini and Barcelona, Lyon and Brussels, Barcelona and Brussels, Brussels and Warsaw, Barcelona and Warsaw, Barcelona and Lyon.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 20 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
